reviewText: Urotsukidoji: Legend Of The Overfiend is probaly the best horror anime ever made, it's blend of graphic violence, hardcore sex scenes and horror enemies are simply awesome and terrifying to watch even in 2012. This DVD is only part 1 of the Saga but it's currently the only part of the series thats in print and hasn't been lost to the ages. Fans need to pick this up and see the magic for themselves, hopefully all the other parts will get re-released at some point.Grade - A+
summary: An Animated Masterpiece - Hardcore, Extreme, Superlative

reviewText: in the past history of film there were much controversy aboutthe issues of sex brutal violence and Nazi propaganda and it'sinfluences of targeting rape and violent acts and Christianitymany film titles like cannibal ferox and the evil dead becamesubject of media exposure of it's nature and now an adult animatedfilm titled urotsukidoji : legend of the overfeind centures aroundthese topics of propaganda violence and rape that due to  media exposurethe film was highly censored in the uk in which it had to be editedand it was banned in most countries around the world and caused an majoruproar about poking fun at religion and disturbing scenes of a childgetting raped by a demonic teacher and it's level of violence I didan viral video titled: urotsukidoji legend of the overfiend audio reviewfor youtube explaining it all but yet like many other video nastiesstill generate an growing fan base today.Frankie (cool rider) smales(Frankie smales tv and movie review uk)

reviewText: They edited and cut out 72 minutes of this movie.  It was initially 180 minutes when it came out on VHS, only 108 now.  Scenes cut out included all the the graphic sex scenes, it's more os a "Soft Porn" movie as it.If you want it for the blood and gore you'll be happy, if your getting it for the hentai sex, DON'T.

reviewText: About 20 years ago a guy at the now closed Pagoda comic shop saw I had a interest in Epic Illustrated, Heavy Metal, and other adult comics and recommended that I take a look at Urotsukidoji: Legend of the Overfiend. I purchased the VHS tape and watched it and was blown away, I had never seen anything like it, definitely not for children.I purchased the DVD for several reasons. The price was good, it's been a few years since I saw the story and was curious if the DVD improved the picture quality. I was not disappointed, the DVD is great and I would reccommend this DVD to anyone who enjoys hard core adult animation.
